item.title: Book Riot’s Deals of the Day for August 8, 2025
item.description: The liberating power of rest, a WWII female spy, Supercommunicators, Indigenous dragons, and more of the best deals of the day

item.title: James Patterson and Vicky Ward to Pen a Luigi Mangione Book
The Lie of “Local Control,” as Texas and Florida Signal What’s Next in Book Censorship: Book Censorship News, August 8, 2025
item.description: The actions Florida and Texas legislation is taking to target school libraries showcase what's to come nationwide. It's not "local control."

item.title: Readin’ Groovy: Graphic Novels About ’60s Musicians
item.description: The 56th anniversary of Woodstock is upon us, and there's no better way to celebrate than with some excellent comics about '60s musicians.

item.title: 10 Novels In and Liane Moriarty is Still Knocking It Out of the Park
item.description: What would you do if you knew how precious every moment of your life was? That's at the heart of this bestselling author's latest read.
